software.bernie.geckolib.manager

Class EntityAnimationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,AnimationController>
        • software.bernie.geckolib.manager.EntityAnimationManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AnimationController>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TileEntityAnimationManager

    public class EntityAnimationManager
extends java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,AnimationController>
    Each entity should have exactly ONE EntityAnimationManager and can add as many animation controllers to the collection as desired.
    See Also:

      • setAnimationSpeed

        public void setAnimationSpeed(double speed)
        Sets the speed multipler of how fast the animation goes. This cannot be negative, and the default value is 1.

      • getCurrentAnimationSpeed

        public double getCurrentAnimationSpeed()

      • setResetSpeedInTicks

        public void setResetSpeedInTicks(double resetTickLength)
        This is how long it takes for any bones that don't have an animation to revert back to their original position
        Parameters:
        resetTickLength - The amount of ticks it takes to reset. Cannot be negative.
